description:
Unity has reported financial results for Q3 2024, which surpassed adjusted profit expectations despite a modest decline in revenue. The company recorded a 2% drop in revenue compared to last year, totalling $429 million, yet this remained above Unity’s guidance of $415 million to $420 million. In a letter to shareholders, Unity expressed optimism about... Read more »

The post Unity exceeds profit expectations despite revenue slide appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Unity exceeds profit expectations despite revenue slide
